title: Ezreal don't feel good
body:
I've tried other keystones in the past, now klepto is gone I thought that maybe conq would be decent but it was pretty meh. What key stones are decent for ezreal of does he just needs a little buff? I still think he is good at 2-3 items however getting those items is a lil harder and I am confident he isn't going to be viable D:.
Conq mid/late game with blood line and bork is kinda funky if you ahead.
